changelog: Updated names of Wolfenstein and Grosse maps
Added toggle to turn on/off weapon logic. (Thanks to Vertraic)
Prompt users to download the latest version of the tracker pack if a newer one is available. (This is not retroactive to versions prior to v1.0.2)
Compressed images for smaller file sizes (courtesy of nivomi)
Map Only view added to the tracker (courtesy of SushiKishi)
